bill.summary:
Exchange Regulatory Improvement Act
This bill directs the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) to adopt regulations interpreting the meaning of the term "facility" under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934. (National exchange facilities are regulated by the SEC.)
